wikipedia_page.main: Sally Prue is a British author known for her novel Cold Tom, which won the Branford Boase Award 2002 and the Smarties Prize Silver Award in 2002. Sally Prue has written eight novels.

response: ::* 9–11 years: Cold Tom by Sally Prue (Oxford University Press)
*Ice Maiden, a 2011 novel by Sally Prue
| 2002 || Sally Prue || Cold Tom || Liz Cross || Oxford

Cold Tom is a fantasy novel by Sally Prue, published on January 31, 2002 by Oxford University Press and aimed at teens and young adults. Cold Tom won the Branford Boase Award and the Smarties Prize Silver Award both in 2002.
